title: Hoode Kayaking
desc: Hoode Kayakking is an adventurous water sport that involves paddling a kayak on the serene waters of Hoode. Its a thrilling experience for both beginners and experts.
tips: Wear a life jacket and follow the guides instructions.
best_time_to_visit: Early morning or late afternoon for pleasant weather and calm waters.

how_to_visit.by_bike: Take a scenic drive to the location.
how_to_visit.by_public: Ideal for a bike ride with beautiful views.

title: Hanging Bridge
desc: The Hanging Bridge is a scenic spot offering breathtaking views and a unique walking experience. Perfect for nature lovers and photographers.
tips: Wear a life jacket and follow the guide's instructions.
best_time_to_visit: During the monsoon season for the best views of the surrounding greenery.

how_to_visit.by_bike: Drive from Bangalore via the Yeshwanthpura-Yelahanka route. The journey takes about an hour, depending on traffic
how_to_visit.by_car: Take a bus from Bangalore to Hesaraghatta. From Hesaraghatta village, hire an auto-rickshaw or taxi to reach the falls.
how_to_visit.by_public: The route is scenic and ideal for a bike ride.

title: Malpe Sea Walk
desc: Malpe Sea Walk provides a beautiful path along the coast, offering stunning sea views and a refreshing sea breeze. It's an ideal spot for an evening stroll.
tips: Carry a camera to capture the stunning views.
best_time_to_visit: Evenings for a beautiful sunset view.

how_to_visit.by_bike: Come along the highway from Udupi
how_to_visit.by_public: You will have to walk a bit if you take public transport for this

title: Malpe Floating Bridge
desc: Malpe Sea Walk provides a beautiful path along the coast, offering stunning sea views and a refreshing sea breeze. It's an ideal spot for an evening stroll.
tips: Be cautious while walking on the floating bridge.
best_time_to_visit: Anytime during the day, but avoid peak hours for a less crowded experience.

title: Kaup Light House
desc: Visit during the early morning or late afternoon for the best light and fewer crowds.
tips: Visit during the early morning or late afternoon for the best light and fewer crowds.
best_time_to_visit: Early morning or late afternoon for the best light and fewer crowds.

how_to_visit.by_bike: Drive to the designated parking area near the attraction.
how_to_visit.by_car: Take a bus or train to the nearest station. From there, use local transportation to reach the site.
how_to_visit.by_public: Ride along scenic routes to the destination.

title: Kudlu Falls
desc: Wear sturdy shoes as the path to the falls can be slippery.
tips: Wear sturdy shoes as the path to the falls can be slippery.
best_time_to_visit: During the monsoon season when the falls are at their fullest.

how_to_visit.by_bike: Drive to the base of the falls, then follow the marked trail.
how_to_visit.by_car: Take a bus to the nearest stop. From there, walk or hire a taxi to the falls.
how_to_visit.by_public: Bike along scenic paths to the falls entrance.

title: Manipal Lake
desc: Carry water and snacks, and enjoy a peaceful boat ride.
tips: Carry water and snacks, and enjoy a peaceful boat ride.
best_time_to_visit: Evenings for a peaceful and relaxing experience.

how_to_visit.by_bike: Drive to the lake's parking area and walk along the designated path.
how_to_visit.by_car: Take a bus to the lake area. From there, walk to the lakefront.
how_to_visit.by_public: Enjoy a bike ride to the lake entrance.

title: Trigger
desc: Trigger is an adrenaline-pumping adventure activity that offers a range of outdoor experiences. Ideal for thrill-seekers looking for excitement.
tips: Follow all safety instructions provided by the activity operators.
best_time_to_visit: Anytime during the day, but morning sessions are generally more active.

how_to_visit.by_bike: Drive to the designated parking area near the trigger site.
how_to_visit.by_car: Take a bus or train to the nearest stop. From there, use local transportation to reach the trigger site.
how_to_visit.by_public: Ride along scenic routes to the trigger site.

title: Ajjarkad Badminton Court
desc: Book the court in advance to ensure availability.
tips: Book the court in advance to ensure availability.
best_time_to_visit: Early mornings for a fresh start and less crowded environment.

title: Tree Park
desc: Visit during the early morning or late afternoon for a peaceful walk.
tips: Visit during the early morning or late afternoon for a peaceful walk.

title: Someshwara
desc: Someshwara Wildlife Sanctuary is a haven for wildlife enthusiasts, offering a chance to see a variety of flora and fauna in their natural habitat.
tips: Carry binoculars for better wildlife viewing.
best_time_to_visit: Early morning or late afternoon for optimal wildlife viewing.

title: Mookambika Wildlife

title: Udupi Goshale
desc: Udupi Goshale is a sanctuary dedicated to the protection and care of cows. It's an educational and serene place to visit.
